label: 紅
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The colour from the carthame dye, a fugitive red lake made from safflowers (Carthamus tinctorius).  The dye has both red and yellow components, but with some difficulty the yellow can be eliminated.  The pigment from the flowers can also be used to produce a makeup rouge. [RK]
